title: Coco Hill - Rum Club
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Caribbean
description: A vegetarian restaurant with an open air atmosphere, porch with a view of the ocean, bar with alcohol and juices. Most food is made-in-house including the coconut bread and toasted coconut caramel used in the drinks. Has Wi-Fi. Sits up the hill from the dock.
streetAddress: Coco Hill, Bastimentos, Isla de Colon
